review: I like the product and the idea.  However, I have noticed that at times not all the channels are available and it takes a restart of the Fire TV to then get all the channels (specific to the Sling TV app).  Also, it will be great if you guys add an "escape" button to the remote because you can only use the "back" button which then freezes the screen while it figures out where to go or you press the wrong button and then you have to figure your way back to where you where ...an escape button will be ideal.  Thank you!

review: Wow!  Verrry nice!  First off it is the only smart device other than a smart phone or tablet (that I know of) that can attach to a 5ghz wireless signal - that alone makes it a winner.  So needless to say there is NO lag, latency, or buffering EVER.  Never even considered it before, but the photo feature with the cloud is something I am using and really like.  Am a Comcast subscriber and have no access to HBOGO or SHOGO but who cares? - have it on the cable box as well as XVTGO.  Got rid of google music finally and am using Amazon music, but have always sensed that the quality of the music is  not as good as other music carriers.  Still think that after going thru the Fire TV.  It's not a big deal, though. The big deal is the digital quality and surround signal and IT IS PERFECT
